#summary References

= Introduction =

SipekSdk is an open source project written in C#. The VoIP interface is based on pjsip.org SIP protocol stack.


* [http://www.pjsip.org pjsip.org SIP protocol stack]
* [http://sites.google.com/site/sipekvoip/sipeksdk SipekSdk Home]

== SipekSdk based projects ==

* [http://sites.google.com/site/sipekvoip/sipek-softphone Sipek Softphone]
* Sipek Windows Mobile Example
* Sipek Instant Softphone Example
* Sipek Linux Softphone
* Sipek IMS client (in progress)
